name: HexWorld (ajd)
description:
Hex-based procedural terrain, including an algorithm to create procedural river systems and biomes.  GPU-based shaders used to show rivers, waterfalls, lakes and ocean.

To navigate the terrain:

Left/Right/Up/Down: move

Q/E: rotate

: zoom

(It takes significant mathematics to compute the hex-based terrain, so there will be a delay of a few seconds before the 3d world becomes visible).

See my blog for further details on the mathematics:

https://ajdaniel38.wixsite.com/online-maths-tutor/post/hexagons-rule-the-world
